params.id: The unique identifier for this node
params.nodeType: The type classification of the node

getMetadata(bytes32,string).details: Searches the metadata string for the key; returns empty string if not found

params.key: The metadata key to look up

returns._0: The metadata value associated with the key

setMetadata(bytes32,string,string).details: Stores metadata as a concatenated string; off-chain indexing recommended for complex queries

getMetadata(bytes32,string).notice: Retrieve a metadata value by key

setMetadata(bytes32,string,string).notice: Set a metadata key-value pair on a node
